subject: [Radiance-general] probing a radiance image,convert radiance to XYZ
body:
Hi Jelle,

Try the following:

ximage -ov [fname.pic] | rcalc -f xyz_rgb.cal -e
'$1=X($1,$2,$3);$2=Y($1,$2,$3);$3=Z($1,$2,$3);'

-Jack
